Generated Narrative: ValueSet gridhamd-answer-options-vs-q5

  • Include these codes as defined in http://example.org/fhir/CodeSystem/gridhamd-answer-options-cs
    CodeDisplay
    Q5-1Absent and Absent or clinically insignificant
    Q5-2Mild (30 – 59 minutes awake) and Absent or clinically insignificant
    Q5-3Mild (30 – 59 minutes awake) and Occasional
    Q5-4Mild (30 – 59 minutes awake) and Much of the time
    Q5-5Mild (30 – 59 minutes awake) and Almost all the time
    Q5-6Marked (1 hour or more awake) and Occasional
    Q5-7Marked (1 hour or more awake) and Much of the time
    Q5-8Marked (1 hour or more awake) and Almost all the time
